wishwawidyalawalata sisun athulath kirime kramawedayak aluthin sakas kirima sandaha widwath kamituwak path kirimata awasara illa gonu kala mosamak shreshtadhikaranaya eeye (24) prathikshepa keleya.mewani kamituwak path kirimata baladharinta saba awashyathawak thibune nam eya kala yuthuwa thibune mita boho kalakata pera bawa shreshtadhikaranaya mehidi sandahan keleya.eheth kal ikuth wi ganna ebandu thiranawalata adhikaranaya hawul kara ganimata ganna me uthsahaya anumatha nokarana bawa winisuru mandulla sandahan keleya.
ithin chithre mata adinna une.podi ekek adina widiyata thama ande.tika dawasakata passe man ehe giya welawaka mata nethu hena hapi eeke sahathikayak genath pennuwa.

mema awasthawata sithulpawwa rajamaha wiharadhipathi pujya matarambaa hemarathana nayaka himi , thissamaharama rajamaha wiharadhipathi pujya aacharya dewalegama dhammasena nayaka himi, mulkirigala rajamaha wiharadhipathi pujya beligalle saranapala nayaka himi, mathara palatuwa bauddhodhaya wiharadhipathi gatamanne gunananda himi, sudarshana dharma nikethanaye lelwala samitha hamii athulu bhikshun wahanse, warimarga amathya chamal rajapaksha, agramathya lekam gamini senarath, dakunu palath aandukara wili gamage, buddhashasana, sanskruthika ha aagamika katayuthu amathyansha lekam em. ke. bandula harischandra, bauddha katuyathu komasaris jenaral sunanda kariyapperuma athulu amathyansha lekamwaru saha dakunu palath rajya niladharin rasak mema awasthawata sahabhagi wuha.

apa siyalu denatama kalayen kalayata wiwidhakarawu una roga athiwe.me kiyanna yanne dostharalatath honda karannata nohaki ape aththa 'una' ganaya.me una therena sinhalen kiyanakala yamak kirimata apa thula athiwana dadi kamaththa wanneya.samaharunge me una samajayata una ganwana athara samaharun ya haki ihalama thalaya wetha osawathabannatada samath wanneya.thawath samaharun maleriyawen men me unen gahemin hinda kisidu halaholmanak nathiwama awasan gaman yana awasthada atha.me kiyannata yanne mage una ganaya.

diyaniya kala thora ganime thibu ahithakara lakshana gana athdakimen piripun piyeku wisin wataha dun aakaraya men ma diyaniya eya awabodha kara gath aakaraya da mehi gab wi pawathi.thamange hasirim prakara wa thama yatha thaththwaya helidaraw wana bawath pamanata wadi dewal penwimata yamen thamanta ma awasi sidu wana bawath wataha ganimata ‘menara natana kota uu heluwen bawa uu danne nathi lu’ yana prasthawa pirula samajayata upakari we.aacharya premadasa shri alawaththagekarthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

manda mun aththatama diwinasagathahoth apata wena pudgalika awasiyak nathi wunada kathawata kiyanna se "garandi mara paw purwagathayuthu nathi” nisaweni ma blog kiyawimata aa mul diwala ( mage atamagale atawagannata pera nohoth kakata pora siyala gana liyu kalaye ) me blog awakashaye sitina ithama daksha rachakayaku wana dukata ohu liyana lipi sujiwa ge nawakatha wage yayi kima nisa podi wadayak giya athara eyin kala awignyanika ho sawignygnyanika balapama nisa in maththata ma dukagen ewani ganaye lipi nodakkemi.
e madiwata arabiyedi dakapu kisi sapak naha.
